topics.body:
You know, I keep hearing about that kid that stabbed some twenty or whatever people in school in Florida. And all I can think is: I hope there was someone out there who brought him down with a book bag. Shit as I remember could be classified a weapon in their own right. Fuck the knife.

Though, I think this is the point where I get to tell people, "I told ya".
